body_html:
After @aymericdamien recommendation I have copied the tensorflow folder with all the training scripts from master version (downloaded from github) into 0.6 (installed version, which is different) and now cifar10_eval goes a bit further, it doesn't say that 'ExponentialMovingAverage' object has no attribute 'variables_to_restore' but once in the variables to restore called function it says

...
File "/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/training/moving_averages.py", line 307, in variables_to_restore
moving_avg_variables = list(set(variables.moving_average_variables() +
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'moving_average_variables'
...

Any ideas?

body:
After @aymericdamien recommendation I have copied the tensorflow folder with all the training scripts from master version (downloaded from github) into 0.6 (installed version, which is different) and now cifar10_eval goes a bit further, it doesn't say that 'ExponentialMovingAverage' object has no attribute 'variables_to_restore' but once in the variables to restore called function it says
